result.Description: For use with older McMyAdmin 2 licences only - functionally identical to the standard Minecraft module.
The official server for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition. Includes the Windows Store and Mobile versions of the game.
For all server types that use Minecraft: Java Edition as the client. Also for use with Spigot, Paper, Forge and other Minecraft: Java Edition mods.
